scenario.name: LOCSIP server side, when the server does not have enough data
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 200 OK - Subscription processed [last_Via:] [last_Record-Route:] [last_From:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_CSeq:] Contact:<sip:locsip@locsip.open-ims.test> Expires: 0 Allow: SUBSCRIBE Content-Length: [len]

NOTIFY sip:lrf.open-ims.test:8060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 20 [last_Call-ID] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:lrf.open-ims.test:8060> Event: location CSeq:41 NOTIFY Subscription-State:terminated; reason=noresource Contact:<sip:locsip@locsip.open-ims.test> Content-Length: 0
